pullrequest.title: Model Submission for Marble HD2 sensor configuration 1

content.raw:
The gimbal is nice.  In the current version, the vehicle moves when the gimbal starts and stops.  I tested setting the inertias of the gimbal links \(pan\_gimbal\_link, tilt\_gimbal\_link\) to small values and it resolves this issue.  The inertias added were just guesses at small values.  Adding the following inertias after the <mass> 0.1 </mass>  is what I tried:

```
    <inertia>
      <ixx>0.00001</ixx>
      <ixy>0</ixy>
      <ixz>0</ixz>
      <iyy>0.00001</iyy>
      <iyz>0</iyz>
      <izz>0.00001</izz>
    </inertia>
```

‌
content.html:
The gimbal is nice. In the current version, the vehicle moves when the gimbal starts and stops. I tested setting the inertias of the gimbal links (pan_gimbal_link, tilt_gimbal_link) to small values and it resolves this issue. The inertias added were just guesses at small values. Adding the following inertias after the <mass> 0.1 </mass> is what I tried:

    <inertia>
      <ixx>0.00001</ixx>
      <ixy>0</ixy>
      <ixz>0</ixz>
      <iyy>0.00001</iyy>
      <iyz>0</iyz>
      <izz>0.00001</izz>
    </inertia>

‌

pullrequest.title: Model Submission for Marble HD2 sensor configuration 1

content.raw: Ah so there are default values that were set too high. Thanks for noticing that and for suggesting the fix. I will implement a change right now.
content.html: Ah so there are default values that were set too high. Thanks for noticing that and for suggesting the fix. I will implement a change right now.

content.raw:
We are migrating this repository to github on April 10th due to [Bitbucket's forthcoming termination of Mercurial]( https://bitbucket.org/blog/sunsetting-mercurial-support-in-bitbucket). We need to close all open pull requests in order to cleanly move this repository to github.

Could you please target this pull request to the [model_pr_427 branch](#!/osrf/subt/branch/model_pr_427)? 

We will merge this pull request on April 8th to the `model_pr_427` branch, complete the migration to github by April 10th, and open a new pull request for this model.

Thank you for the submission and help with our migration.
content.html:
We are migrating this repository to github on April 10th due to Bitbucket's forthcoming termination of Mercurial. We need to close all open pull requests in order to cleanly move this repository to github.

Could you please target this pull request to the model_pr_427 branch?

We will merge this pull request on April 8th to the model_pr_427 branch, complete the migration to github by April 10th, and open a new pull request for this model.

Thank you for the submission and help with our migration.
